# {{< fa database >}} Data Package & Analysis {background-color="#5b195b"}

## Historical Data Digitization

**Project:** Convert scanned historical records into digital data

- Collect historical papers/records
- Create organized image folders
- Use Claude to extract and analyze data
- Create structured datasets
- Build data packages for archival data
---

## Open Wash Data Package Workflow

**Project:** Create new analyses using existing packages

- Clone existing openwashdata package
- Use Claude to write analytical articles
- Add personal notes and templates
- Create vignettes demonstrating usage
- Share insights with community
# {{< fa palette >}} Branding & Design {background-color="#5b195b"}

## Create Brand Guidelines

**Project:** Comprehensive branding for openwashdata

- Design color palettes (colorblind-friendly)
- Create common design elements
- Develop brand YAML templates
- Package YAML configurations
- Implement via pull requests

**Deliverables:**
- Style guide document
- Template repository
- Implementation examples
# {{< fa search >}} Data Discovery {background-color="#5b195b"}

## Identify New Data Sources

**Project:** Expand openwashdata collection

- Research WASH data sources
- Evaluate data quality
- Create data packages
- Document metadata
- Submit to openwashdata

---

## SFD Report Analysis

**Project:** Analyze Shit Flow Diagram reports

- Collect all SFD PDF reports
- Use Claude to extract data sources
- Categorize as primary/secondary
- Analyze data collection methods:
  - Key informant interviews
  - Focus group discussions
  - Lab analysis
  - Observations

**Output:** Comprehensive methodology database

---

## SFD Data Validation

**Project:** Verify SFD data quality

- Collect all SFD JSON files
- Cross-check data completeness
- Identify placeholder vs actual data
- Create data quality report
- Suggest improvements

## Assignment Templates

**Project:** Streamline assignment feedback

- Create response templates

- Test with real assignments
- Document usage patterns
- Share with educators

## Document Conversion

**Project:** Modernize course materials

- Convert Word reports to Quarto
- Create slide templates
- Maintain formatting consistency
- Add interactive elements

## Grading Automation

**Project:** Develop automated assessment tools

- Design grading rubrics
- Test on previous assignments
- Use Claude for evaluation
- Compare with manual grading
- Refine accuracy

**Output:** Validated grading system

---

## Git-based Submissions

**Project:** Modernize assignment submission

- Design Git/GitHub workflow
- Create student guides
- Set up template repositories
- Automate collection process
- Replace email/Google Docs

**Benefits:** Version control, professional skills, automated workflows
